send_to_cs: Send to CS immediately for post-purchase issues
Send to CS for payment processing issues
tone: Don't tell customers that we'll be restocking
Close the conversation when a customer responds 'no'
templates: If a cx reaches out regarding the Early Access event, use EAE shortcut
For cx reaching out in Spanish use SSC shortcut
For checkout issues use the "Check out Issues" temp
For store item availability, use SPA shortcut
If cx's email doesn't work for early access, use EEA shortcut
dos_and_donts: They occasionally run sign-up campaigns where cx text certain keywords (‚Äúreleases,‚Äù ‚Äúearly access‚Äù) to join a list. If a customer sends a similar keyword:
All clothing is true to size unless otherwise stated on the product page
You can use these sizing charts for reference (for internal use only): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kmra_vOwCJuHoAx9D4L4Qx95rxafHcrqn-ZGutfzLgg/edit?usp=sharing
For store info q's (phone number/additional info) - use the store locator with your VPN turned on!
